content: wrap yourself in this lovely crochet shawl perfect for the warmer months featured in our chainette-style caron colorama lacy this light and flowing wrap lets you practice chain stitch double_crochet and more with a fun 70s retro vibe it s versatile enough to be featured in any color that suits your style the one-size-fits-all design makes it an ideal gift for all the fashionistas on your list materials caron® colorama lacy™ 8 oz/ 227g 361 yds/ 330 m spectral 11013 2 balls or 595 yds/544 m measurements approx 22½ x 60 57 x 152 5 cm
